Options.Name: resource_group_name
Options.Documentation: The name of the resource group containing the resource. The name is case insensitive.

Options.Name: resource_provider_namespace
Options.Documentation: The namespace of the resource provider.

Options.Name: parent_resource_path
Options.Documentation: The parent resource identity.

Options.Name: resource_type
Options.Documentation: The resource type of the resource.

Options.Name: resource_name
Options.Documentation: The name of the resource to get the permissions for.

Options.Name: resource_provider_namespace
Options.Documentation: The namespace of the resource provider.

Options.Name: expand
Options.Documentation: Specifies whether to expand the values.

Options.Name: scope
Options.Documentation: The scope of the role assignment to create. The scope can be any REST resource instance. For example, use '/subscriptions/{subscription-id}/' for a subscription, '/subscriptions/{subscription-id}/resourceGroups/{resource-group-name}' for a resource group, and '/subscriptions/{subscription-id}/resourceGroups/{resource-group-name}/providers/{resource-provider}/{resource-type}/{resource-name}' for a resource.

Options.Name: role_assignment_name
Options.Documentation: The name of the role assignment to create. It can be any valid GUID.

Options.Name: parameters
Options.Documentation: Parameters for the role assignment.

Options.Name: properties
Options.Documentation: Role assignment properties.

SubOptions.Name: role_definition_id
SubOptions.Documentation: The role definition ID used in the role assignment.

SubOptions.Name: principal_id
SubOptions.Documentation: The principal ID assigned to the role. This maps to the ID inside the Active Directory. It can point to a user, service principal, or security group.

Options.Name: resource_group_name
Options.Documentation: The name of the resource group.

Options.Name: resource_provider_namespace
Options.Documentation: The namespace of the resource provider.

Options.Name: parent_resource_path
Options.Documentation: The parent resource identity.

Options.Name: resource_type
Options.Documentation: The resource type of the resource.

Options.Name: resource_name
Options.Documentation: The name of the resource to get role assignments for.

Options.Name: filter
Options.Documentation: The filter to apply on the operation. Use $filter=atScope() to return all role assignments at or above the scope. Use $filter=principalId eq {id} to return all role assignments at, above or below the scope for the specified principal.

Options.Name: scope
Options.Documentation: The scope of the role assignment.

Options.Name: role_assignment_name
Options.Documentation: The name of the role assignment to get.

Options.Name: scope
Options.Documentation: The scope of the role definition.

Options.Name: role_definition_id
Options.Documentation: The ID of the role definition.

Options.Name: role_definition
Options.Documentation: The values for the role definition.

Options.Name: properties
Options.Documentation: Role definition properties.

Options.Name: role_name
Options.Documentation: The role name.

Options.Name: description
Options.Documentation: The role definition description.

Options.Name: type
Options.Documentation: The role type.

Options.Name: permissions
Options.Documentation: Role definition permissions.

Options.Name: assignable_scopes
Options.Documentation: Role definition assignable scopes.

Options.Name: scope
Options.Documentation: The scope of the role definition.

Options.Name: role_definition_id
Options.Documentation: The ID of the role definition.
